summary: Adds over 10 spell tomes to buy from the wizard in dragonreach (in whiterun)
descriptionHtml:
EverLast Tomes. 
Ever get bummed about not having that many spells in skyrim? 
this mod might help you, it adds close to 10 more spells to buy from our favorite mage in whiterun, farengar! 


each spell is 100 gold(your barter level will affect the price, i started a new player and all the spells were about 297 gold), it will be a bit of a mystery of what each does, but the name gives them away, they are mostly normal spells but i changed the amount they do, times they last, things of that sort, i also added a few you normally wont be able to use, like the Spectral Arrow, or Steam from the Dwarven Robots. 

Optional: Ice Spike Barrage.
A spell that shoots a barrage of ice spikes as if it was flames, a stream of ice spikes getting shot with good damage. comes in 4 levels, each level gains in damage, but also in price and magicka requirements. spell tomes can be purchased from farengar in dragonreach 

if there are any issues at all, please tell me in a comment. 
(hint, self destruction can kill you) 

Also on steam!
author: Elderblade910
